mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectDspPromtDspTgt Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ PROMT_SN , DSP_TGT_TURN , DSP_TGT_TP_CD , MALL_ID , LANG_CD , DVC_CD , TGT_MBR_TP_CD , TGT_MBR_ATRB_CD , GRPCO_ID , GOD_EVL_EXPSR_YN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM DSP_PROMT_DSP_TGT WHERE 1 = 1 AND PROMT_SN = #{promtSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND DSP_TGT_TURN = #{dspTgtTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
